original_text: He supplied a lot of iron to make things for the temple. That was for nails and bars to fix the doors at the entrances. He also supplied more bronze than they could weigh.
korean_text: 다윗이 또 문짝 못과 거멀 못에 쓸 철을 많이 준비하고 또 무게를 달 수 없을 만큼 심히 많은 놋을 준비하고

sentences.original_text: He supplied a lot of iron
to make things for the temple
That was for nails and bars
to fix the doors at the entrances

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 더 많은 청동을 공급했습니다
그들이 무게를 잴 수 있는 것보다 더 많은
